member.name: T:APSPService.IQueryService
member.summary: Interface that define the methods that the APSP WCF Service should provide.

member.name: M:APSPService.IQueryService.getAllPersons
member.summary: This Method should provide a JSON object (QueryResult) with list of the whole set of Persons (Villanos + Super Heroes)
member.returns: Returns a JSON object the type QueryResult that includes the list of Persons in the attribute lPersons. In case of Error the attribute lPersons will be null and attribute errorDescription will contain the description of the error

member.name: M:APSPService.IQueryService.getVillanos
member.summary: This Method should provide a JSON object (QueryResult) with the list of Villanos
member.returns: Returns a JSON object the type QueryResult that includes the list of Villanos in the attribute lPersons. In case of Error the attribute lPersons will be null and attribute errorDescription will contain the description of the error

member.name: M:APSPService.IQueryService.getSuperHeroes
member.summary: This Method should provide a JSON object (QueryResult) with the list of Super Heroes
member.returns: Returns a JSON object the type QueryResult that includes the list of Super Heroes in the attribute lPersons. In case of Error the attribute lPersons will be null and attribute errorDescription will contain the description of the error

member.name: M:APSPService.IQueryService.getSuperHeroesXML
member.summary: This Method should provide a XML object (QueryResult) with the list of Super Heroes
member.returns: Returns a XML object the type QueryResult that includes the list of Super Heroes in the attribute lPersons. In case of Error the attribute lPersons will be null and attribute errorDescription will contain the description of the error

member.name: M:APSPService.IQueryService.saveVillanos
member.summary: This Method should save a list of Villanos in a File called "VILLANOS.DAT"
member.returns: The Method give back a QueryResult JSON Object with tha attribute idError = 0 in case that the File was saved sucessfully and idError = -1 in case of the file wasnt saved properly.

member.name: M:APSPService.IQueryService.saveSuperHeroes
member.summary: This Method should save a list of Super Heroes in a File called "SUPERHEROES.DAT"
member.returns: The Method give back a QueryResult JSON Object with tha attribute idError = 0 in case that the File was saved sucessfully and idError = -1 in case of the file wasnt saved properly.

member.name: T:APSPService.QueryService
member.summary: WCF Service that provides a set of methods to get and save Villanos and SuperHeroes data. [ServiceBehavior(InstanceContextMode = InstanceContextMode.PerCall, ConcurrencyMode = ConcurrencyMode.Multiple)]

member.name: M:APSPService.QueryService.getAllPersons
member.summary: GET Method that provides a JSON object (QueryResult) with list of the whole set of Persons (Villanos + Super Heroes)
member.returns: Returns a JSON object the type QueryResult that includes the list of Persons in the attribute lPersons. In case of Error the attribute lPersons will be null and attribute errorDescription will contain the description of the error

member.name: M:APSPService.QueryService.getVillanos
member.summary: GET Method that provides a JSON object (QueryResult) with the list of Villanos
member.returns: Returns a JSON object the type QueryResult that includes the list of Villanos in the attribute lPersons. In case of Error the attribute lPersons will be null and attribute errorDescription will contain the description of the error

member.name: M:APSPService.QueryService.getSuperHeroes
member.summary: GET Method that provides a JSON object (QueryResult) with the list of Super Heroes
member.returns: Returns a JSON object the type QueryResult that includes the list of Super Heroes in the attribute lPersons. In case of Error the attribute lPersons will be null and attribute errorDescription will contain the description of the error

member.name: M:APSPService.QueryService.getSuperHeroesXML
member.summary: GET Method that provides a XML object (QueryResult) with the list of Super Heroes
member.returns: Returns a XML object the type QueryResult that includes the list of Super Heroes in the attribute lPersons. In case of Error the attribute lPersons will be null and attribute errorDescription will contain the description of the error

member.name: M:APSPService.QueryService.saveVillanos
member.summary: POST Method to save the list of Villanos in a File called "VILLANOS.DAT"
member.returns: The Method give back a QueryResult JSON Object with tha attribute idError = 0 in case that the File was saved sucessfully and idError = -1 in case of the file wasnt saved properly.

member.summary: POST Method to save the list of Super Heroes in a File called "SUPERHEROES.DAT"
